name: Pro Basketball Manager 2016 - US Edition
description: In Pro Basketball Manager 2016 US edition you will take the reins of a North American pro team or college side and compete in their respective championships. Outside competition, you must manage recruitment, finances and training while, on game day, you must take control of your players and lead your team to the top of the rankings.
minimum_requirements: OS: WINDOWS VISTA/WINDOWS 7/WINDOWS 8/WINDOWS 10 Processor: AMD/INTEL DUAL-CORE 2.5 GHZ Memory: 3072 MB RAM Graphics: 768 MB 100% DIRECTX 10 AND SHADERS 4.0 COMPATIBLE ATI RADEON HD 5670/NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 260 OR HIGHER Sound Card: DIRECTX COMPATIBLE Additional Notes: INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED FOR THE GAME ACTIVATION *WINDOWS XP NOT SUPPORTED
